overview: Grandma took the only peach to the Buddha, the boy was puzzled. Eager for the fresh taste of the peach, he began to use 18 martial arts, hoping to successfully steal the peach. In this one process, the boy entered his fantasy world, undertake combat with Four Heavenly Kings, unexpectedly peach was broken, however in fight, the readout of two people want to fall from this empty. But instead of scolding the boy, the grandmother foresaw the hope of life from the naked peach stone.
title: Tao Yuan
